SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DepartmentID , AA.Name , AA.ParentID , AA.ManagerID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.SortOrder
, EE.Name as ManagerName
FROM dbo.TDepartmentHistory AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = EE.ID WHERE AA.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TDepartmentHistory AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TDepartmentHistory ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, DepartmentID, Name, ParentID, ManagerID, SortOrder, StartDate, EndDate ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #DepartmentID#, #Name#, #ParentID#, #ManagerID#, #SortOrder#, #StartDate#, #EndDate# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:

, DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# , Name = #Name# , ParentID = #ParentID# , ManagerID = #ManagerID# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
